plot outline: Gini aka Ganesh, a cab driver meets a passenger Ammu aka Amrutha in his cab. Gini and Ammu click instantly and end up having a funny conversation on various aspects of life. As Gini continues to narrate his story, it turns out that both of them are connected to that story. How are they connected?
title: Gini Helida Kathe
plot: Gini aka Ganesh, a cab driver meets a passenger Ammu aka Amrutha in his cab. Gini and Ammu click instantly and end up having a funny conversation on various aspects of life. As Gini continues to narrate his story, it turns out that both of them are connected to that story. How are they connected?

Ganesh, knowns as Gini to his loved ones, is a cab driver who leads the happy-go-lucky life with his friends. Enroute one of his trips to Kodagu, he narrates his love story to his customer. The tale is filled with action and emotions, but will he find closure to it?::Sunayana Suresh
